name: Too Many Bears
description:
Hello friend! Thanks for taking the time to check out my submission to the 40th Ludum Dare 

- Basic WASD to move, Space to jump, aim with the mouse, left click throws a single high powered bear bomb and right click several weaker bombs in quick succession.
- Escape will return to the title screen

- The UI tends to break down at lower resolutions, so fullscreen is recommended.
- There's only a small level prototype at the moment, checkpoints will allow you to further upgrade your bears if you make it through.
- All upgrades reset on death
